name: ghlocalapi
description: Documentation for Google Home's local API
author: Rithvik Vibhu <rithvikvibhu@gmail.com> (https://keybase.io/rithvikvibhu)

scripts.build: redoc-cli build -t template.hbs --title 'Google Home Local API' --output dist/index.html GoogleHome.openapi3.json
scripts.serve: redoc-cli serve -t template.hbs --title 'Google Home Local API' --ssr GoogleHome.openapi3.json
